1455.27.text:
If you have the answer,
you want to put it down

1458.63.text:

Now I'm gonna say,

1463.20.text:

and I'm gonna move on,

1467.00.text: so that card is now over.

1470.53.text:
ten times five,

can have up to--

1478.97.text:

can have the same card,

so that's where competition

1482.93.text:
So you want to be quicker
than your peers,

1488.00.text:

So we have a chart

1500.30.text:
So, for number one,
like, number one,

there's one times one,

1505.67.text:

one times two,

1509.73.text:
so Grover and Laura

1512.27.text:
and whoever puts
it down first

1513.57.text:

1516.90.text:
so there's up to four

1521.07.text:
What we call the ones circled

1526.67.text:
So if you have it,
there's benefits

1530.03.text:
and other things, some kids

1534.00.text:
I say, "Well, it depends

1536.57.text:
If you know that answer
and you put it down,

1538.80.text:
you're the only one
during that round,

you don't have to worry

So the goal, ultimately, is

1545.80.text:
in your hand, and when

you take, not only
back your card,

1550.10.text:
but you also take
